name: 皇家守衛 菲歐拉
description: 要是有人膽敢直視王位，就會對上皇家守衛隊長菲歐拉警覺的雙眼。她是靈巧、敏銳、精明的代名詞，以刺劍代筆來書寫自己的傳奇篇章。甚至有傳聞說她在年幼時期，就能將落下的葉子完美地切成兩半。無論謠言是真是假，菲歐拉都從未親口證實……

wikiSkinData.lore: If one dares to gaze upon the crown, they'll immediately catch the careful eye of Fiora, the captain of the Royal Guard. Cunning, keen, and shrewd, she's written her own legend at the tip of her rapier, a legend so large that it's said, as a child, she could slice a falling leaf perfectly in half. Whether or not it's true... Fiora has never told.
